name: Tess Adventure
description:
In a century when the climate change is no longer a talk of the future but the bitter reality, Tess Robinson lives alone on a decaying oil platform. On her own she has to survive her every day and wonder, if there is any hope beyond the ocean.

Tess Aventure is a 2D Puzzle Adventure Game made with Unity 5.4.2 and AdventureCreator.

The Team behind Tess Adventure:

  • Christopher Boeckh (Character & Animation)
  • Katherine Tiedemann (Puzzle Design)
  • Myriel Schigiol (Game Design, Environment Art, UI)

This game was created at the Game Design // UE Department of the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai (SoSe 2016)
